title: Christian Science Bible Lessons
additional-notes: Renewals were made for editions of this publication in Braille as well as the regular edition. In the regular edition, volume 57 number 2 is dated April-June 1946; in the Braille edition, it is dated May 1946.
Christian Science Bible Lessons have also been published under the Christian Science Quarterly name.  Renewals for Christian Science Quarterly are listed separately.
